org.anddev.andengine.ui.activity
Class BaseGameActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      org.anddev.andengine.ui.activity.BaseActivity
          org.anddev.andengine.ui.activity.BaseGameActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseSplashActivity, LayoutGameActivity
public abstract class BaseGameActivity
extends BaseActivity
implements IGameInterface

The BaseGameActivity is the root of a game, that contains an Engine and manages to create a SurfaceView the contents of the Engine will be drawn into. There is always exactly one Engine for one BaseGameActivity. You can proceed from one BaseGameActivity to another using common Android mechanisms.

Lifecycle:

  • Launch game
    1. onLoadEngine()
    2. onResume()
    3. onLoadResources()
    4. onLoadScene()
    5. onLoadComplete()
    6. onGameResumed()
  • during game, go to homescreen
    1. onPause()
  • return to game
    1. onResume()
    2. onGameResumed()
  • exit game with this.finish()
    1. onPause()
    2. onDestroy()
  • return to game after dialog.dismiss()
    1. onGameResumed()
